search.query: sourcetype=sv_apps host="$source$" Name="$application$" | stats dc(Name) as appcount | fieldformat appcount=tostring(appcount, "commas")

sourcetype=sv_appresponse host="$source$" Name="$application$" | regex "Avg Response Time"="[0-9\.:]+" | appendpipe [stats count as no_event | where no_event==0 | eval "Avg Response Time"=-1] | rex field="Avg Response Time" "((?<hour>[0-9]{2}){1}:(?<minute>[0-9]{2}){1}:){0,1}(?<second>[0-9]{1,2}){1}\.(?<microsecond>[0-9]{6}){1}" | fillnull value=0 hour minute second microsecond | eval art=if('Avg Response Time'==-1,-1,(hour*3600)+(minute*60)+second+(microsecond/1000000)) | stats avg(art) as avgart | eval avgart=if(avgart>=0,tostring(round(avgart,2), "commas"),"N/A")

sourcetype=sv_appresponse host="$source$" Name="$application$" | regex "Worst Response Time"="[0-9\.:]+" | appendpipe [stats count as no_event | where no_event==0 | eval "Worst Response Time"=-1] | rex field="Worst Response Time" "((?<hour>[0-9]{2}){1}:(?<minute>[0-9]{2}){1}:){0,1}(?<second>[0-9]{1,2}){1}\.(?<microsecond>[0-9]{6}){1}" | fillnull value=0 hour minute second microsecond | eval wrt=if('Worst Response Time'==-1,-1,(hour*3600)+(minute*60)+second+(microsecond/1000000)) | stats max(wrt) as maxwrt | eval maxwrt=if(maxwrt>=0,tostring(round(maxwrt,2), "commas"),"N/A")
sourcetype=sv_apps host="$source$" Name="$application$" | timechart dc(Name) as "Application Count"

sourcetype=sv_appresponse host="$source$" Name="$application$" | regex "Avg Response Time"="[0-9\.:]+" | rex field="Avg Response Time" "((?<hour>[0-9]{2}){1}:(?<minute>[0-9]{2}){1}:){0,1}(?<second>[0-9]{1,2}){1}\.(?<microsecond>[0-9]{6}){1}" | fillnull value=0 hour minute second microsecond | eval art=if(isnull('Avg Response Time'),null,(hour*3600)+(minute*60)+second+(microsecond/1000000)) | timechart eval(round(avg(art),2)) as "Average Response Time"

sourcetype=sv_appresponse host="$source$" Name="$application$" | regex "Worst Response Time"="[0-9\.:]+" | rex field="Worst Response Time" "((?<hour>[0-9]{2}){1}:(?<minute>[0-9]{2}){1}:){0,1}(?<second>[0-9]{1,2}){1}\.(?<microsecond>[0-9]{6}){1}" | fillnull value=0 hour minute second microsecond | eval wrt=if(isnull('Worst Response Time'),null,(hour*3600)+(minute*60)+second+(microsecond/1000000)) | timechart eval(round(max(wrt),2)) as "Worst Response Time"

sourcetype=sv_appresponse host="$source$" Name="$application$" "Avg Response Time"="*" "Worst Response Time"="*" | rex field=Duration "((?<dhour>[0-9]{2}){1}:(?<dminute>[0-9]{2}){1}:){0,1}(?<dsecond>[0-9]{1,2}){1}\.(?<dmicrosecond>[0-9]{6}){1}" | rex field="Avg Response Time" "((?<arthour>[0-9]{2}){1}:(?<artminute>[0-9]{2}){1}:){0,1}(?<artsecond>[0-9]{1,2}){1}\.(?<artmicrosecond>[0-9]{6}){1}" | rex field="Worst Response Time" "((?<wrthour>[0-9]{2}){1}:(?<wrtminute>[0-9]{2}){1}:){0,1}(?<wrtsecond>[0-9]{1,2}){1}\.(?<wrtmicrosecond>[0-9]{6}){1}" | fillnull value=0 dhour dminute dsecond dmicrosecond arthour artminute artsecond artmicrosecond wrthour wrtminute wrtsecond wrtmicrosecond | eval dur=if(isnull(Duration) AND (dhour==0) AND (dminute==0) AND (dsecond==0) AND (dmicrosecond==0),null,(dhour*3600)+(dminute*60)+dsecond+(dmicrosecond/1000000)) | eval art=if(isnull('Avg Response Time') AND (arthour==0) AND (artminute==0) AND (artsecond==0) AND (artmicrosecond==0),null,(arthour*3600)+(artminute*60)+artsecond+(artmicrosecond/1000000)) | eval wrt=if(isnull('Worst Response Time') AND (wrthour==0) AND (wrtminute==0) AND (wrtsecond==0) AND (wrtmicrosecond==0),null,(wrthour*3600)+(wrtminute*60)+wrtsecond+(wrtmicrosecond/1000000)) | stats sum(Events) as Events sum(Flows) as Flows avg(dur) as "Average Duration (Seconds)" avg(art) as "Average Response Time (Seconds)" max(wrt) as "Worst Response Time (Seconds)" by Name | fieldformat Events=tostring(Events, "commas") | fieldformat Flows=tostring(Flows, "commas") | fieldformat "Average Duration (Seconds)"=tostring('Average Duration (Seconds)', "commas") | fieldformat "Average Response Time (Seconds)"=round('Average Response Time (Seconds)', 2) | fieldformat "Worst Response Time (Seconds)"=round('Worst Response Time (Seconds)', 2) | rename Name as Application | sort - "Worst Response Time (Seconds)"
